products.title: Odyssey Reef Boot
products.body_html:
Rocky entries, low tide reef walks, or long parking lots are no match for the Odyssey Reef boot. This mid-cut boot has a stiffer than average sole to ensure nothing will cut your feet. Dual hook and loop straps offer boot stability while the shock cord ankle closure seals out water. Internal split-toe fit keeps the boot in place. The textured sole gives you a superior grip over slippery terrain, along with the ability to grip your board securely. Perfect with or without a wetsuit.

Features:

  • Internal split-toe design
  • Dual hook and loop stabilization
  • Shock cord ankle closure
  • Durable texture grip sole
  • Limestone based neoprene

products.title: 3mm Aire Boots
products.body_html:
Your feet get cold, you get cold. You get cold, you get out of the water, and end your session early. Solution? Keep your feet warm in our round-toed, internal split, 3mm Aire Boots, and keep that session going!

Built with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our Aire Boots are packed with feet-saving features that cut the cold and protect on the rocky walk to the water, including a fast-drying, heat-trapping Thermal Lock fleece liner.

products.title: 5mm Aire Boots
products.body_html:
Your feet get cold, you get cold. You get cold, you get out of the water, and end your session early. Solution? Keep your feet warm in our round-toed, internal split, 5mm Aire Boots, and keep that session going!

Built with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our Aire Boots are packed with feet-saving features that cut the cold and protect on the rocky walk to the water, including a fast-drying, heat-trapping Thermal Lock fleece liner.

products.title: 2mm Aire Light Neo Glove
products.body_html:
Keep the chills off your hands with the Aire Light 1.5mm Neo Glove. This thinner version of our harsh conditions Aire gloves offers the same pre-curved design to reduce hand and forearm fatigue. The rubberized texture on the palm gives you a solid grip. Integration with the wetsuit cuffs will keep warmth locked in and the cold out.

Features:

  • Sustainable, durable limestone-based neoprene
  • Pre-curve design eliminates hand pump
  • Tapered wrist entry creates a tight seal, trapping water out
  • Rubberized wetsuit integration
  • Rubberized texture on palm and fingers

products.title: 3mm Aire Neo Gloves
products.body_html: Like most everyone else, we were tired of wearing clunky gloves in the water. So we did what we always do—went to the design studio and created ones that are far superior. Made with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our 3mm Aire Gloves have a pre-curve design that eliminates the hand pump associated with most neoprene gloves. We also added a rubberized texture to provide a more tactile feel and a Thermal Lock fleece liner for maximum warmth.

products.title: 5mm Aire Neo Gloves
products.body_html: Like most everyone else, we were tired of wearing clunky gloves in the water. So we did what we always do—went to the design studio and created ones that are far superior. Made with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our 5mm Aire Gloves have a pre-curve design that eliminates the hand pump associated with most neoprene gloves. We also added rubberized texture to provide a more tactile feel and a Thermal Lock fleece liner for maximum warmth.

products.title: Reach Full Finger Glove
products.body_html:
If it is not fatigue it will be exposure that will cut your session short. Keep your hands warm and your sessions long with the Reach water gloves. Featuring full synthetic durable material that increases grip and decreases fatigue on wing foil handles, windsurfing booms, and kite bars. The full finger design offers the ultimate full hand coverage from the harsh elements.

Features

  • Full-finger glove for complete protection from the elements
  • Hook and loop wrist closure
  • Dual-layer, grip-enhanced, palm and finger material for durability
  • Synthetic quick-dry material with elastane stretch panels for a comfortable fit

Sizes
X-Small, Small, Medium, Large, X-Large

products.title: Flight Half Finger Glove
products.body_html:
Looking for more connection to your power source without losing the tactile feel and dexterity in your fingers? The Flight glove features a full synthetic material construction that increases grip on wing handles, booms, and kite bars while decreasing fatigue and protecting you from the elements. The half finger design retains dexterity and allows for easy rigging, gear setup and on water adjustments, all with the gloves on.

Features

  • Half-finger glove retaining tactile feel and dexterity
  • Hook and loop wrist closure
  • Dual-layer, grip-enhanced, palm and finger material for durability
  • Synthetic quick-dry material with elastane stretch panels for a comfortable fit

Sizes
X-Small, Small, Medium, Large, X-Large

products.title: Taxi Kneepad
products.body_html:
Kneeling while wing foiling is a necessity, even if the grippy EVA deck pad tends to rip holes in your knees.

Spend more time on the water with less pain by adding one small accessory to your session. The Taxi Knee Pad is designed to be an extra layer between you and the deck pad. Wear it on your bare skin or under your wetsuit for added padding.

Features

  • Engineered weaved elastic pattern for comfort and protection
  • Elastane piped top and bottom edges for secure, comfortable, in-place hold

products.title: Ankle Gaskets
products.body_html: Balloon leg, elephant leg, water baby… whatever you call it, it's annoying. Even if your wetsuit has an ankle drain hole this nuisance can't be 100% avoided. We decided enough was enough and designed our Ankle Gaskets: a simple yet highly effective hook-and-loop strap that keep water from entering through your ankle openings of your wetsuit. Bye-bye, balloon leg.
